title: How to use 7 sphere Syndra Ult
body:
So I have owned The Dark Sovereign since her release and have found her to be my favorite champion in the game.. IMO she has strongest zoning and kiting capability in the game. 

So first off let's just look at her tool tip so you can get an idea of just how much damage you can do! 

**Unleashed Power**
(Active): Draws upon Syndra's full cataclysmic power, harnessing all Dark Spheres to deal magic damage to her target per sphere. Unleashed Power will use the three spheres that orbit Syndra, ensuring a minimum damage.Â 
All Dark Spheres remain on the ground for 6 seconds after Unleashed Power is used.
Cost: 100 mana
Cooldown: 100 / 90 / 80 seconds
Damage per Sphere: 90 / 135 / 180 (+0.15 per ability power)

Minimum Damage (3 spheres): 270 / 405 / 540 (+0.45 per ability power)

Damage with 7 spheres: 630 / 975 / 1260 (+1.05 per ability power)

It still does so it of damage with the minimum amount of spheres so once late game comes around you should be able to drop them with 1 skill rotation. 

You're going to need 40% CDR.. To do this go 21/0/9 going for cdr or you could even go with 9/0/21 for utility but I wouldn't reccomend this.. 

First buy a Grail vs ap or morellonomicon vs Ad,, that's 20%cdr right there.. 
Next buy Boots of lucidity and you're capped at 40% with the extra Cdr from your masteries.

So here's what you do.. Q then Q again,, the next part is what makes or breaks the 7 sphere ult.  after you have the 2 spheres out the first one should be about to expire as your q is coming off the cool down for casting the second sphere.  You will have to Q AND use W at the same time to pick up the first sphere then immediately drop it back down and hit R,, and there you have it a 7 sphere ult that will completely decimate health bars.. 

I recommend smart cast as this makes it immensely easier to pull it off and also makes micro managing your spheres easier. Once you get comfortable with syndra I recommend you can get sorc's over lucidity as there are other items that can give you cdr and damage(DFG, buy an elixer for cost efficient cdr)  and the cdr boots take away from your burst.
